name: The Line's (DEMO)
description:
The Line's is an adventure about a gang of dudes searching for a common enemy who can answer their questions but finding on the way with a mystery much bigger than it appears to be.

Play time:Around 1 or 1 and a half.

Here you'll find:

-A lot of semi-trash comedy.

-Psychedelic battle backgrounds.

-A  fairly interactive world.

!! Writte in the comments if you want more from this game in the future ¡¡
